records.otherInformation: (UK Sanctions List Ref):RUS1465. Financial sanctions imposed in addition to an asset freeze: Trust services. Date trust services sanctions imposed: 21/03/2023. (UK Statement of Reasons):Lyudmila Aleksandrovna OCHERETNAYA (formerly, PUTINA) is the former First Lady of the Russian Federation and ex-wife of Vladimir Putin. There are reasonable grounds to suspect that OCHERETNAYA is a member of, or associated with, a person who is or has been involved in destabilising Ukraine or undermining or threatening the territorial integrity, sovereignty or independence of Ukraine. (Gender):Female UK Sanctions List Date Designated: 13/05/2022

records.otherInformation:
Regime Name: The Russia (Sanctions) (EU Exit) Regulations 2019 
Sanctions Imposed: Asset freeze|Travel Ban|Trust Services Sanctions 
Designation Source: UK 
Last Update Date: 18/05/2022 
UK Statement of Reasons: 
Lyudmila Aleksandrovna OCHERETNAYA (formerly, PUTINA) is the former First Lady of the Russian Federation and ex-wife of Vladimir Putin. There are reasonable grounds to suspect that OCHERETNAYA is a member of, or associated with, a person who is or has been involved in destabilising Ukraine or undermining or threatening the territorial integrity, sovereignty or independence of Ukraine.
 The trust services sanctions were imposed on 21/03/2023. 
Asset Freeze: YesArms Embargo: NoTargeted Arms Embargo: NoChartering Of Ships: NoClosure Of Representative Offices: NoCrew Servicing Of Ships And Aircraft: NoDeflag: NoPrevention Of Business Arrangements: NoProhibition Of Port Entry: NoTravel Ban: YesPrevention Of Chartering Of Ships: NoPrevention Of Chartering Of Ships And Aircraft: NoTechnical Assistance Related To Aircraft: No
